name: Smogon Dex Dark Blue theme
description:
Smogon, your pokedex is designed wonderfully, but why no dark theme!


Little bit of css I threw together so I wasn't blinded by my monitor while playing Pokemon at 2am like a respectable human being.
additional_info:
19 August 2016 V1.02
- Added style for export text box

15 August 2016 V1.01
- Added style for 'BlockMoveInfo' Class

15 August 2016 V1.0
 - Initial Release
